title.rendered: 32 Fabulous New Year’s Eve Parties Around Melbourne

content.rendered:
The year has flown by, and soon, we’ll be counting down to the fireworks and celebrating the start of 2025. If you haven’t made plans yet, Melbourne is full of wonderful places for you to dance the night away. Sip on free-flowing drinks, move and groove on the dancefloor, and watch the spectacular fireworks at these lovely venues. In no particular order, here are some excellent New Year’s Eve parties around Melbourne.

1. Fed Square

Fed Square will have a free program of entertainment on the Main Stage, with plenty of DJs to help you dance your way into the new year. You’ll also find special dining and entertainment packages around Fed Square, so there’s plenty of New Year’s Eve parties for you to join in the heart of Melbourne. Then, at midnight, feel surrounded by the fireworks. See more here.

📍Swanston St & Flinders St, Melbourne VIC 3000

2. Victoria by Farmer’s Daughters

In Fed Square, Victoria by Farmer’s Daughters is throwing a NYE party. Start with welcome drinks, feast on a progressive sharing menu and indulge in a four hour drinks package. There will be live music to keep the party vibes going. Stick around for the fireworks at midnight. Tickets are $240 per person. More info here.

📍Federation Square, Tenancy 26/2 Swanston St, Melbourne VIC 3004

3. Afloat and Arbory Bar & Eatery

On New Year’s Eve, Afloat and Arbory Bar & Eatery will say goodbye to 2024 with an ‘Italo Disco’ extravaganza. Feel transported to ’70s and ’80s Italy, with disco balls, flowing drinks, DJs and roaming canapes. Then, enjoy incredible views of the fireworks. Doors open at 6pm. There’s a few different packages available, which you can check out here.

 2 Flinders Walk, Melbourne VIC 3000

4. Yarra Botanica

Take in some of the best views of the fireworks from this floating pontoon bar. Yarra Botanica will keep you happily busy with DJs and surprise entertainment across both floors. Graze on roaming canapes throughout the night and enjoy either a two-hour or four-hour beverage package. Then, when midnight strikes, see the magnificent fireworks from the heart of the Yarra. General admission tickets are $99 per person. Learn more here.

Southbank Promenade, Southbank VIC 3006

5. Fleet

Feel like you’ve got a front row seat to the fireworks at Fleet rooftop bar. There’s an open bar to look forward to, as well as roaming canapes and DJs. When the clock strikes 12, gaze at the fireworks and see spectacular views of the Yarra River and skyline. General admission tickets are $295 per person. More details here.

📍Level 22, 1 Queen Street, Melbourne VIC 3000

6. Riverland Bar

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Riverland Bar (@riverlandbar)

Head to the banks of the Yarra and enjoy a spectacular evening at Riverland Bar. Doors open at 6pm with pizza available for purchase, and you can enjoy an all-inclusive food and drink package from 8pm. Have unlimited beer, wine, bubbles and spirits, as well as a selection of roving food. DJs will take over two dance floors, and there will also be a fire performer to light up the night. General admission tickets are $185. Learn more here.

Federation Wharf 1-9 Melbourne, VIC 3000

7. HER

Multi-level hospitality venue HER is going all out and throwing a night to remember for New Year’s Eve. There’s a few different ways for you to celebrate. Head up to the rooftop, party under the stars and receive uninterrupted views of the fireworks. Indulge in a four-course Steak Frites menu at HER Bar or a four-course fiery dinner at BKK. Or ring in the new year with a nine-hour party in the Music Room. Bookings are required for everything except the Music Room event. Learn more here.

270 Lonsdale St, Melbourne VIC 3000

8. QT Melbourne

End the year with glitz and glamour at The Rooftop at QT. Graze on luxurious canapes, freshly shucked oysters, a live rotisserie and a late-night dessert station. Pair it with bottomless drinks packages, and dance into 2025 with a DJ, live band and saxophonist. When the clock strikes midnight, gaze at the spectacular fireworks over the city skyline. General admission tickets are $325, and the party starts at 7pm. See more here.

133 Russell St, Melbourne VIC 3000

9. Trinket

Trinket on Flinders Lane is ready to welcome the new year. There’s no need to purchase a ticket, just make a general reservation and join them for the celebration. A DJ will spin tunes from 9pm to 2am, and the best-dressed guest wins a bottle of champagne. Cheers to that! See more here.

87 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 3000

10. Garden State Hotel

Garden State Hotel is teaming up with Thursday Events to through a NYE Singles Party. Receive a drink on arrival and mingle throughout the night. There will canapes to keep you going, as well as a DJ. Who knows? You might find someone to kiss at midnight. Tickets start from $50. Learn more here.

101 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 3000

11. Melbourne River Cruises

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Melbourne River Cruises (@melbournerivercruises)

Melbourne River Cruises has a few parties for you to choose from on New Year’s Eve. Catch the early fireworks on a Twilight Cruise, see the classic fireworks on the Midnight Fireworks Cruise, dance the night away on a Party Cruise and more. See what’s available here.

📍Southbank Promenade, Southbank VIC 3006

12. Hotel Nacional

Head to the rooftop of Hotel Nacionale for roaming canapes and a four hour drinks package on New Year’s Eve. The package includes frozen margaritas as well as beer and wine. The night begins at 8:30pm, and tickets are $180 per person. More details here.

📍23-25 Hardware Ln, Melbourne VIC 3000

13. The Q

Soar up to the 28th level of Quincy Hotel, and ring in the new year at The Q. Take in 360-degree views of Melbourne CBD and listen to DJs spin tunes all night long. Receive a Bae Juice on arrival to help you stay hydrated, and drink cocktails, spirits, beer and wine all night long. There will be canapes throughout the night. The party starts at 8pm, and tickets are $190 per person. See more here.

📍Quincy Hotel, Level 28, 509 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 3000

14. Bar Bambi

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Bar Bambi (@barbambi_melbourne)

Bar Bambi is throwing a Big Band Party for New Year’s Eve. Wander into this basement venue and experience a 1950s, New York-style big band performance by Mr Bobby Fox, followed by DJ sets and dancing. There will be complimentary canapes and drinks from 7:30pm to 8:30pm, and standing room tickets are $55 per person. Otherwise, you can enjoy a three-course dinner and bottle service for $250 per person. The party will end at 2am. Learn more here.

📍Basement 103-105 Flinders Lane, AC/DC La, Melbourne VIC 3000

15. State of Grace

Head up to the rooftop of State of Grace, and take in epic views of the fireworks. There’s a four hour beverage package, featuring a selection of wine, beer, cider and roaming canapes. There will also be entertainment throughout the night, such as DJs, a magician and more. Doors open at 7:30pm. First release tickets are $180. See more here.

📍27 King St, Melbourne VIC 3000

16. Curious at W Melbourne

Curious invites you to go ‘Down the Rabbit Hole’ at W Melbuorne on New Year’s Eve. Spend a night on the dance floor and look forward to live performances, DJs and roaming entertainment. Receive a champagne on arrival, followed by bubbles, rosé, wine, and three classic cocktails. The party starts at 7:30pm and tickets are $255. More info here.

📍408 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 3000

17. Freyja

End the new year with a decadent six-course chef’s selection menu at Freyja. Opt for the ‘Fireworks and Champagne’ ticket, and receive exclusive access to Level 35 to witness the fireworks display. Dinner costs $325 per person, and the fireworks add-on is an extra $100. Learn more here.

📍477 Collins St, Melbourne VIC 3000

18. Imperial Hotel

Celebrate the end of the year with a rooftop party at Imperial Hotel Bourke Street. Enjoy a four hour drinks package of beer, wine and spirits, along with roaming canapes and excellent views of the fireworks. Doors open at 7pm, with the drinks package starting at 8pm. There will be live music from 7pm to 10pm, as well as a DJ from 10pm to 1am. Tickets are currently $170. See more here.

📍2-8 Bourke Street, Melbourne VIC 3000

19. Le Méridien Melbourne

Head to the rooftop poool deck and terrace for a New Year’s Eve party at Le Méridien Melbourne. Treat yourself to free-flowing drinks, unlimited canapes and live food stations, as well as great views of the fireworks over Fitzroy Gardens and the CBD. Tickets for the rooftop party are $210 per person, and you can add a four-course dinner at the restaurant Dolly for $325 per person. The pool won’t be open for swimming during this event. More details here.

📍20 Bourke St, Melbourne VIC 3000

20. Melbourne Skydeck

 7 Riverside Quay, Southbank VIC 3006

21. H2oh’s NYE on the Yarra

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by New Years Eve Melbourne - h2oh (@nyeh2omelbourne)

Head to Metropolis Evens in Southbank for one of the most renowned New Year’s Eve parties. Dance the night away and let loose with a plenty of drinks and light cocktail food. Take in views of the Yarra and watch the stunning fireworks. Tickets for H2oh’s NYE on the Yarra start from $165. See more here.

📍Upper Level, Southgate Shopping Precinct, Southbank VIC 3006

22. Hopscotch

Stay by the river this New Year’s Eve and party until midnight at Hopscotch. There’s a few options for you to choose from, with drink packages, a self-serve grazing station, DJs and roaming entertainers. General admission tickets start at $20 per person. See more here.

📍Ground Floor/4 Riverside Quay, Southbank VIC 3006

23. Johnny’s Green Room

Look forward to a night of DJs, cocktails, pizza and pasta at Johnny’s Green Room. A standing party ticket costs $220, and includes a cocktail and snack menu, as well as food stations and an open bar. Meanwhile, a seated ticket costs $365 and includes a set-menu dining experience followed by the best views of the midnight fireworks. It’s all happening from 7pm to 1am. More info here.

📍Level 2/293-297 Lygon St, Carlton VIC 3053

24. Harlow

Gaze at the midnight fireworks from the rooftop at Harlow. There’s a four-hour package that includes bottomless seltzers, roaming champagne and canapes. There will also be DJs in the basement from 8pm until late. Tickets are $100. More info here.

📍447 Church St, Richmond VIC 3121

25. St Kilda Sea Baths

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Better In Colour Events (@betterincolourevents)

Head to St Kilda Sea Baths for a fantastic end-of-year celebration by Better In Colour. Captain Baxter, Sea Baths Rooftop, Republica and Encore will open for the festivities. Watch the final sunset of 2024, and enjoy two hours of complimentary basic drinks from 4pm to 6pm. There will also be canapes, and over 30 DJs across four rooms. Ring in the New Year by the iconic beach, and watch the fireworks in the distance. Early bird tickets start from $85 plus booking fee. Learn more here.

 10/10-18 Jacka Blvd, St Kilda VIC 3182

26. Hotel Esplanade

The Espy has two different New Year’s Eve parties for you to try just outside of Melbourne. Have a party in the main area, and enjoy a 3.5 hour drinks package, as well as grazing bites, entertainment and DJs. General tickets start at $150 person.

Otherwise, pop into the Ghost Bar for an intimate experience, and graze on canapes, oysters and three hours of drinks. You’ll also enjoy access to all other rooms at The Espy. Tickets are $210 per person.

11 The Esplanade, St Kilda VIC 3182

27. Stokehouse

There’s a few options for you at the Stokehouse precinct this New Year’s Eve. Indulge in a five-course meal, along with bay views and live entertainment at the restaurant for $395 per person.

Celebrate with a four-course meal and live DJs at Stokehouse Pasta & Bar for $180 per person. For a more casual affair, grab their Deck Access ticket for $40 per person, receive an Aperol Spritz on arrival, and enjoy DJs and light table service.

📍30 Jacka Blvd, St Kilda VIC 3182

28. Yugen

Descend underground and countdown to midnight at Yugen. Make a dinner reservation from 8:15pm, then stick around for their New Year’s Eve party. Receive a cocktail on arrival, and indulge in Asian-inspired canapes. Dance until midnight and have fun with live dancers, a saxophonist and a mix of disco, deep house and progressive beats from DJ DNE. If you’re not starting with dinner, entry is at 10:30pm. Early tickets are $55 per person. More info here.

📍605 Chapel St, South Yarra VIC 3141

29. Grazeland

Ring in the New Year at Grazeland. Choose between the family-friendly general admission experience, or opt for the 18+ Premium Deck Package. Enjoy food vouchers, have fun with face-painting and look forward to entertainment like DJs and live music. In the adults-only party, there will be plenty of free-flowing drinks. At midnight, get prime views of the city fireworks. Tickets start at $48 per person. See more here.

📍20 Booker St, Spotswood VIC 3015

30. Sebastian

Spend your New Year’s Eve by the sea at Sebastian in Williamstown. There’s a family-friendly event, which runs from 5:30pm to 7:30pm, and includes a four-course shared set menu of Spanish-inspired delights. It costs $110 for adults and $40 for kids.

Otherwise, head to their evening event from 8:30pm to late, and enjoy a selection of pintxos canapes and a glass of bubbles on arrival. Enjoy small plates and large plates at your table, then move to the beachfront deck for more drinks, roaming desserts and DJ sets. Tickets are $210. Make your bookings here.

📍26 Esplanade, Williamstown VIC 3016

31. Tallboy & Moose

Have an experience that’s out of this world at Tallboy & Moose’s Beers & Beyond NYE Party. In this space-themed event, you can enjoy an unlimited 4-hour drinks package for $69. Entry is free, and you can enjoy DJs from 8pm and a free photobooth. There will also be prizes for best dressed, so come by in your best sci-fi inspired look. Learn more here.

📍270 Raglan St, Preston VIC 3072

32. The Continental Sorrento

Not looking for New Year’s Eve parties in Melbourne? Swap city views for the seaside and escape to Sorrento. The Conti is ringing in the new year with an extravagant, ‘Viva La Playa’ party. Feel immersed in a beach club atmosphere, and count down to midnight with roaming entertainment, live music and a four-hour food and drinks package. Tickets cost $295. See more here.

1-21 Ocean Beach Road, Sorrento, Victoria, 3943, Sorrento

After enjoying the parties, try: 15 Spectacular Places To See The Melbourne Fireworks On New Year’s Eve

secondary_title_from_acf: From inner-city rooftop sessions to celebrations by the sea, there's lots of incredibly fun ways to say farewell to 2024.
_oembed_ddcf8db6db804bc1ea2fa47e9d1b2fde: New Year’s Eve
_yoast_wpseo_title: The Best New Year's Eve Parties Around Melbourne
_yoast_wpseo_metadesc: End the year with a bang at some thrilling New Year's Eve parties around Melbourne. There's inner-city events and parties further out.
_oembed_b5b3ab932ffaaa6477d8a9683ee0486d:
We are very sorry to advise that the Docklands drone swarm will no longer be going ahead as planned on New Year’s Eve because of COVID-19 challenges.

The swarms scheduled to take to the skies twice a night from 3 January will also be delayed to a later date. 1/3

— City of Melbourne (@cityofmelbourne) December 29, 2021

A standing party ticket costs $220, and includes a cocktail and snack menu, as well as food stations and an open bar. Meanwhile, a seated ticket costs $365 and includes a set-menu dining experience followed by the best views of the midnight fireworks. It's all happening from 7pm to 1am. 📍Level 2/293-297 Lygon St, Carlton VIC 305324. HarlowGaze at the midnight fireworks from the rooftop at Harlow. There's a four-hour package that includes bottomless seltzers, roaming champagne and canapes. There will also be DJs in the basement from 8pm until late. Tickets are $100. 📍447 Church St, Richmond VIC 312125. St Kilda Sea BathsHead to St Kilda Sea Baths for a fantastic end-of-year celebration by Better In Colour. Captain Baxter, Sea Baths Rooftop, Republica and Encore will open for the festivities. Watch the final sunset of 2024, and enjoy two hours of complimentary basic drinks from 4pm to 6pm. There will also be canapes, and over 30 DJs across four rooms. Ring in the New Year by the iconic beach, and watch the fireworks in the distance. Early bird tickets start from $85 plus booking fee.  10/10-18 Jacka Blvd, St Kilda VIC 318226. Hotel EsplanadeThe Espy has two different New Year’s Eve parties for you to try just outside of Melbourne. Have a party in the , and enjoy a 3.5 hour drinks package, as well as grazing bites, entertainment and DJs. General tickets start at $150 person.Otherwise, pop into the  for an intimate experience, and graze on canapes, oysters and three hours of drinks. You’ll also enjoy access to all other rooms at The Espy. Tickets are $210 per person.11 The Esplanade, St Kilda VIC 318227. StokehouseThere's a few options for you at the Stokehouse precinct this New Year's Eve. Indulge in a five-course meal, along with bay views and live entertainment at the .Celebrate with a four-course meal and live DJs at  for $180 per person. For a more casual affair, grab their Deck Access ticket for $40 per person, receive an Aperol Spritz on arrival, and enjoy DJs and light table service.📍30 Jacka Blvd, St Kilda VIC 318228. Descend underground and countdown to midnight at Yugen. Make a dinner reservation from 8:15pm, then stick around for their New Year's Eve party. Receive a cocktail on arrival, and indulge in Asian-inspired canapes. Dance until midnight and have fun with live dancers, a saxophonist and a mix of disco, deep house and progressive beats from DJ DNE. If you're not starting with dinner, entry is at 10:30pm. Early tickets are $55 per person. 📍605 Chapel St, South Yarra VIC 314129. GrazelandRing in the New Year at Grazeland. Choose between the family-friendly general admission experience, or opt for the 18+ Premium Deck Package. Enjoy food vouchers, have fun with face-painting and look forward to entertainment like DJs and live music. In the adults-only party, there will be plenty of free-flowing drinks. At midnight, get prime views of the city fireworks. Tickets start at $48 per person. 📍20 Booker St, Spotswood VIC 301530. SebastianSpend your New Year's Eve by the sea at Sebastian in Williamstown. There's a family-friendly event, which runs from 5:30pm to 7:30pm, and includes a four-course shared set menu of Spanish-inspired delights. It costs $110 for adults and $40 for kids.Otherwise, head to their evening event from 8:30pm to late, and enjoy a selection of pintxos canapes and a glass of bubbles on arrival. Enjoy small plates and large plates at your table, then move to the beachfront deck for more drinks, roaming desserts and DJ sets. Tickets are $210. 📍26 Esplanade, Williamstown VIC 301631. Tallboy & MooseHave an experience that's out of this world at Tallboy & Moose's Beers & Beyond NYE Party. In this space-themed event, you can enjoy an unlimited 4-hour drinks package for $69. Entry is free, and you can enjoy DJs from 8pm and a free photobooth. There will also be prizes for best dressed, so come by in your best sci-fi inspired look. 📍270 Raglan St, Preston VIC 307232. Not looking for New Year’s Eve parties in Melbourne? Swap city views for the seaside and escape to Sorrento. The Conti is ringing in the new year with an extravagant, 'Viva La Playa' party. Feel immersed in a beach club atmosphere, and count down to midnight with roaming entertainment, live music and a four-hour food and drinks package. Tickets cost $295. 1-21 Ocean Beach Road, Sorrento, Victoria, 3943, SorrentoAfter enjoying the parties, try: "},{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://secretmelbourne.com/new-years-eve-parties-melbourne/","url":"https://secretmelbourne.com/new-years-eve-parties-melbourne/","name":"The Best New Year's Eve Parties Around Melbourne","isPartOf":{"@id":"https://secretmelbourne.com/#website"},"primaryImageOfPage":{"@id":"https://secretmelbourne.com/new-years-eve-parties-melbourne/#primaryimage"},"image":{"@id":"https://secretmelbourne.com/new-years-eve-parties-melbourne/#primaryimage"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://offloadmedia.feverup.com/secretmelbourne.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/13223928/Yarra-Botanica-new-years-eve-parties-melbourne.jpg","datePublished":"2022-12-07T08:05:44+00:00","dateModified":"2024-12-18T06:52:51+00:00","description":"End the year with a bang at some thrilling New Year's Eve parties around Melbourne. yoast_head_json.title: The Best New Year's Eve Parties Around Melbourne
yoast_head_json.description: End the year with a bang at some thrilling New Year's Eve parties around Melbourne. There's inner-city events and parties further out.
yoast_head_json.og_description: End the year with a bang at some thrilling New Year's Eve parties around Melbourne. There's inner-city events and parties further out.
yoast_head_json.author: Nicole de Souza

@graph.headline: 32 Fabulous New Year’s Eve Parties Around Melbourne
@graph.articleBody: The year has flown by, and soon, we'll be counting down to the fireworks and celebrating the start of 2025. If you haven't made plans yet, Melbourne is full of wonderful places for you to dance the night away. Sip on free-flowing drinks, move and groove on the dancefloor, and watch the  at these lovely venues. In no particular order, here are some excellent New Year's Eve parties around Melbourne.1. Fed SquareFed Square will have a free program of entertainment on the Main Stage, with plenty of DJs to help you dance your way into the new year. You’ll also find special dining and entertainment packages around Fed Square, so there’s plenty of New Year’s Eve parties for you to join in the heart of Melbourne. Then, at midnight, feel surrounded by the fireworks. 📍Swanston St & Flinders St, Melbourne VIC 30002. In Fed Square, Victoria by Farmer's Daughters is throwing a NYE party. Start with welcome drinks, feast on a progressive sharing menu and indulge in a four hour drinks package. There will be live music to keep the party vibes going. Stick around for the fireworks at midnight. Tickets are $240 per person. 📍Federation Square, Tenancy 26/2 Swanston St, Melbourne VIC 30043.  and Arbory Bar & EateryOn New Year’s Eve, Afloat and Arbory Bar & Eatery will say goodbye to 2024 with an 'Italo Disco' extravaganza. Feel transported to '70s and '80s Italy, with disco balls, flowing drinks, DJs and roaming canapes. Then, enjoy incredible views of the fireworks. Doors open at 6pm. There's a few different packages available, which you can check out . 2 Flinders Walk, Melbourne VIC 30004. Source: SuppliedTake in some of the best views of the fireworks from this floating pontoon bar. Yarra Botanica will keep you happily busy with DJs and surprise entertainment across both floors. Graze on roaming canapes throughout the night and enjoy either a two-hour or four-hour beverage package. Then, when midnight strikes, see the magnificent fireworks from the heart of the Yarra. General admission tickets are $99 per person. Southbank Promenade, Southbank VIC 30065. Feel like you've got a front row seat to the fireworks at Fleet rooftop bar. There's an open bar to look forward to, as well as roaming canapes and DJs. When the clock strikes 12, gaze at the fireworks and see spectacular views of the Yarra River and skyline. General admission tickets are $295 per person. 📍Level 22, 1 Queen Street, Melbourne VIC 30006. Riverland BarHead to the banks of the Yarra and enjoy a spectacular evening at Riverland Bar. Doors open at 6pm with pizza available for purchase, and you can enjoy an all-inclusive food and drink package from 8pm. Have unlimited beer, wine, bubbles and spirits, as well as a selection of roving food. DJs will take over two dance floors, and there will also be a fire performer to light up the night. General admission tickets are $185. Federation Wharf 1-9 Melbourne, VIC 30007. Supplied/Image credit: Griffin SimmMulti-level hospitality venue HER is going all out and throwing a night to remember for New Year’s Eve. There’s a few different ways for you to celebrate. Head up to the rooftop, party under the stars and receive uninterrupted views of the fireworks. Indulge in a four-course Steak Frites menu at HER Bar or a four-course fiery dinner at BKK. Or ring in the new year with a nine-hour party in the Music Room. Bookings are required for everything except the Music Room event. 270 Lonsdale St, Melbourne VIC 30008. QT MelbourneEnd the year with glitz and glamour at The Rooftop at QT. Graze on luxurious canapes, freshly shucked oysters, a live rotisserie and a late-night dessert station. Pair it with bottomless drinks packages, and dance into 2025 with a DJ, live band and saxophonist. When the clock strikes midnight, gaze at the spectacular fireworks over the city skyline. General admission tickets are $325, and the party starts at 7pm. 133 Russell St, Melbourne VIC 30009. TrinketTrinket on Flinders Lane is ready to welcome the new year. There's no need to purchase a ticket, just make a general reservation and join them for the celebration. A DJ will spin tunes from 9pm to 2am, and the best-dressed guest wins a bottle of champagne. Cheers to that! 87 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 300010. Garden State HotelGarden State Hotel is teaming up with Thursday Events to through a NYE Singles Party. Receive a drink on arrival and mingle throughout the night. There will canapes to keep you going, as well as a DJ. Who knows? You might find someone to kiss at midnight. Tickets start from $50. 101 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 300011. Melbourne River CruisesMelbourne River Cruises has a few parties for you to choose from on New Year’s Eve. Catch the early fireworks on a Twilight Cruise, see the classic fireworks on the Midnight Fireworks Cruise, dance the night away on a Party Cruise and more. 📍Southbank Promenade, Southbank VIC 300612. Head to the rooftop of Hotel Nacionale for roaming canapes and a four hour drinks package on New Year's Eve. The package includes frozen margaritas as well as beer and wine. The night begins at 8:30pm, and tickets are $180 per person. 📍23-25 Hardware Ln, Melbourne VIC 300013. The QSoar up to the 28th level of Quincy Hotel, and ring in the new year at The Q. Take in 360-degree views of Melbourne CBD and listen to DJs spin tunes all night long. Receive a Bae Juice on arrival to help you stay hydrated, and drink cocktails, spirits, beer and wine all night long. There will be canapes throughout the night. The party starts at 8pm, and tickets are $190 per person. 📍Quincy Hotel, Level 28, 509 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 300014. Bar BambiBar Bambi is throwing a Big Band Party for New Year's Eve. Wander into this basement venue and experience a 1950s, New York-style big band performance by Mr Bobby Fox, followed by DJ sets and dancing. There will be complimentary canapes and drinks from 7:30pm to 8:30pm, and standing room tickets are $55 per person. Otherwise, you can enjoy a three-course dinner and bottle service for $250 per person. The party will end at 2am. 📍Basement 103-105 Flinders Lane, AC/DC La, Melbourne VIC 300015. State of GraceHead up to the rooftop of State of Grace, and take in epic views of the fireworks. There’s a four hour beverage package, featuring a selection of wine, beer, cider and roaming canapes. There will also be entertainment throughout the night, such as DJs, a magician and more. Doors open at 7:30pm. First release tickets are $180. 📍27 King St, Melbourne VIC 300016. Curious at W MelbourneCurious invites you to go 'Down the Rabbit Hole' at W Melbuorne on New Year's Eve. Spend a night on the dance floor and look forward to live performances, DJs and roaming entertainment. Receive a champagne on arrival, followed by bubbles, rosé, wine, and three classic cocktails. The party starts at 7:30pm and tickets are $255. 📍408 Flinders Ln, Melbourne VIC 300017. End the new year with a decadent six-course chef’s selection menu at Freyja. Opt for the ‘Fireworks and Champagne’ ticket, and receive exclusive access to Level 35 to witness the fireworks display. Dinner costs $325 per person, and the fireworks add-on is an extra $100. 📍477 Collins St, Melbourne VIC 300018. Imperial HotelCelebrate the end of the year with a rooftop party at Imperial Hotel Bourke Street. Enjoy a four hour drinks package of beer, wine and spirits, along with roaming canapes and excellent views of the fireworks. Doors open at 7pm, with the drinks package starting at 8pm. There will be live music from 7pm to 10pm, as well as a DJ from 10pm to 1am. Tickets are currently $170. 📍2-8 Bourke Street, Melbourne VIC 300019. Head to the rooftop poool deck and terrace for a New Year's Eve party at Le Méridien Melbourne. Treat yourself to free-flowing drinks, unlimited canapes and live food stations, as well as great views of the fireworks over Fitzroy Gardens and the CBD. Tickets for the rooftop party are $210 per person, and you can add a four-course dinner at the restaurant Dolly for $325 per person. The pool won't be open for swimming during this event. 📍20 Bourke St, Melbourne VIC 300020. Treat yourself to one of the highest New Year’s Eve parties in the city at Melbourne Skydeck. At 88 floors above sea level, you’ll see the iconic Melbourne fireworks from a whole new perspective. Feast on a six-course menu and unwind with a premium drinks package. The night starts at 7:30pm, and you're encouraged to wear cocktail or Gatsby attire. Tickets start at $575 per person.  7 Riverside Quay, Southbank VIC 300621. H2oh’s NYE on the YarraHead to Metropolis Evens in Southbank for one of the most renowned New Year’s Eve parties. Dance the night away and let loose with a plenty of drinks and light cocktail food. Take in views of the Yarra and watch the stunning fireworks. Tickets for H2oh’s NYE on the Yarra start from $165. 📍Upper Level, Southgate Shopping Precinct, Southbank VIC 300622. HopscotchStay by the river this New Year's Eve and party until midnight at Hopscotch. There's a few options for you to choose from, with drink packages, a self-serve grazing station, DJs and roaming entertainers. General admission tickets start at $20 per person. 📍Ground Floor/4 Riverside Quay, Southbank VIC 300623. Johnny's Green RoomLook forward to a night of DJs, cocktails, pizza and pasta at Johnny's Green Room. A standing party ticket costs $220, and includes a cocktail and snack menu, as well as food stations and an open bar. Meanwhile, a seated ticket costs $365 and includes a set-menu dining experience followed by the best views of the midnight fireworks. It's all happening from 7pm to 1am. 📍Level 2/293-297 Lygon St, Carlton VIC 305324. HarlowGaze at the midnight fireworks from the rooftop at Harlow. There's a four-hour package that includes bottomless seltzers, roaming champagne and canapes. There will also be DJs in the basement from 8pm until late. Tickets are $100. 📍447 Church St, Richmond VIC 312125. St Kilda Sea BathsHead to St Kilda Sea Baths for a fantastic end-of-year celebration by Better In Colour. Captain Baxter, Sea Baths Rooftop, Republica and Encore will open for the festivities. Watch the final sunset of 2024, and enjoy two hours of complimentary basic drinks from 4pm to 6pm. There will also be canapes, and over 30 DJs across four rooms. Ring in the New Year by the iconic beach, and watch the fireworks in the distance. Early bird tickets start from $85 plus booking fee.  10/10-18 Jacka Blvd, St Kilda VIC 318226. Hotel EsplanadeThe Espy has two different New Year’s Eve parties for you to try just outside of Melbourne. Have a party in the , and enjoy a 3.5 hour drinks package, as well as grazing bites, entertainment and DJs. General tickets start at $150 person.Otherwise, pop into the  for an intimate experience, and graze on canapes, oysters and three hours of drinks. You’ll also enjoy access to all other rooms at The Espy. Tickets are $210 per person.11 The Esplanade, St Kilda VIC 318227. StokehouseThere's a few options for you at the Stokehouse precinct this New Year's Eve. Indulge in a five-course meal, along with bay views and live entertainment at the .Celebrate with a four-course meal and live DJs at  for $180 per person. For a more casual affair, grab their Deck Access ticket for $40 per person, receive an Aperol Spritz on arrival, and enjoy DJs and light table service.📍30 Jacka Blvd, St Kilda VIC 318228. Descend underground and countdown to midnight at Yugen. Make a dinner reservation from 8:15pm, then stick around for their New Year's Eve party. Receive a cocktail on arrival, and indulge in Asian-inspired canapes. Dance until midnight and have fun with live dancers, a saxophonist and a mix of disco, deep house and progressive beats from DJ DNE. If you're not starting with dinner, entry is at 10:30pm. Early tickets are $55 per person. 📍605 Chapel St, South Yarra VIC 314129. GrazelandRing in the New Year at Grazeland. Choose between the family-friendly general admission experience, or opt for the 18+ Premium Deck Package. Enjoy food vouchers, have fun with face-painting and look forward to entertainment like DJs and live music. In the adults-only party, there will be plenty of free-flowing drinks. At midnight, get prime views of the city fireworks. Tickets start at $48 per person. 📍20 Booker St, Spotswood VIC 301530. SebastianSpend your New Year's Eve by the sea at Sebastian in Williamstown. There's a family-friendly event, which runs from 5:30pm to 7:30pm, and includes a four-course shared set menu of Spanish-inspired delights. It costs $110 for adults and $40 for kids.Otherwise, head to their evening event from 8:30pm to late, and enjoy a selection of pintxos canapes and a glass of bubbles on arrival. Enjoy small plates and large plates at your table, then move to the beachfront deck for more drinks, roaming desserts and DJ sets. Tickets are $210. 📍26 Esplanade, Williamstown VIC 301631. Tallboy & MooseHave an experience that's out of this world at Tallboy & Moose's Beers & Beyond NYE Party. In this space-themed event, you can enjoy an unlimited 4-hour drinks package for $69. Entry is free, and you can enjoy DJs from 8pm and a free photobooth. There will also be prizes for best dressed, so come by in your best sci-fi inspired look. 📍270 Raglan St, Preston VIC 307232. Not looking for New Year’s Eve parties in Melbourne? Swap city views for the seaside and escape to Sorrento. The Conti is ringing in the new year with an extravagant, 'Viva La Playa' party. Feel immersed in a beach club atmosphere, and count down to midnight with roaming entertainment, live music and a four-hour food and drinks package.
